signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a centralized way to track owner inbound messages across multiple platforms, leading to potential missed communications.
signals.customer_ask: A way to track owner messages that haven't been responded to in the last 24 hours.
signals.suggested_solution: A centralized interface within Hiver to see all communications for owners, tenants, and vendors in an organized fashion.
signals.context: Property management company with seven active team members managing 170 doors.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about team members responding to the same email without awareness of each other's actions.
signals.customer_ask: A solution to prevent multiple responses to the same tenant email.
signals.suggested_solution: A feature that allows tracking of email responses to avoid duplication.
signals.context: Property management company with seven active team members managing 170 doors.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs internal communication capabilities to replace Slack.
signals.customer_ask: A feature for internal communications within the platform.
signals.suggested_solution: An all-in-one platform that includes internal communication features.
signals.context: Property management company with seven active team members managing 170 doors.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to track KPIs related to response times for owners and tenants.
signals.customer_ask: The ability to pull reports for KPI purposes.
signals.suggested_solution: A feature that allows tracking and reporting of response times.
signals.context: Property management company with seven active team members managing 170 doors.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the potential complexity and learning curve of the new software.
signals.customer_ask: A system that is easy to learn and not overly complex.
signals.suggested_solution: A simplified interface that reduces clutter and complexity.
signals.context: Property management company with seven active team members managing 170 doors.
